name: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.PhonemeInfoKey
desc: Keys for the speech phoneme information.

items.name: static let example: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.PhonemeInfoKey
items.desc: An example word that illustrates the use of the phoneme.

items.name: static let hiliteEnd: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.PhonemeInfoKey
items.desc: The character offset into the example word that identifies the location of the end of the phoneme.

items.name: static let hiliteStart: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.PhonemeInfoKey
items.desc: The character offset into the example word that identifies the location of the beginning of the phoneme.

items.name: static let symbol: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.PhonemeInfoKey
items.desc: The symbol used to represent the phoneme.
